name: WoT Garage Discord Bot
description: Discord bot which displays WoT player profile.

WOT_APPLICATION_ID.description: Required to make calls to the Wargaming API key, you can sign up for a client id here: https://developers.wargaming.net/applications/

WOT_REGION.description: The server region you'd like to query, for example `us`, or `eu`.

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN.description: The token for your Discord bot user, you can sign up for one here: https://discordapp.com/developers/docs/intro
